text: Poklanyaytes' Bogu, i vmeste s Nim nikogo ne bogotvorite, delaya dobro roditelyam, blizkim rodstvennikam, sirotam, nishchim, sosedyam, rodstvennym po plemeni, i sosedyam inoplemonnym, strannikam, puteshestvennikam, nevol'nikam, kakimi ovladela desnitsa vasha; Bog ne lyubit tekh, kotoryye kichlivy, tshcheslavny
